#IKnewIWasOld the day I figured out that back when I was 30 years old
column4: I didn’t know shit about anything.

text: #IKnewIWasOld when all I wanted to do after a good meal is take a nap.
#IKnewIWasOld when I started caring about the “I’ve Fallen and I Can’t Get Up!” TV commercials.
#IKnewIWasOld when the Obituary Pages became a fascinating read.
#IKnewIWasOld when Adult fans come up to me and say “I watched you on PBS when I was a kid.”
#IKnewIWasOld when I decided to to drink bottles of Wine that cost twice as much
column4: but do so only half as often.

text: #IKnewIWasOld when it became unsafe to ignite the appropriate number of Candles on my Birthday Cake.
#IKnewIWasOld when I stopped liking Barbecue Potato Chips
#IKnewIWasOld when I started liking all the Music my parents listened to.
#IKnewIWasOld when I saw the next generation complain about social issues that my generation didn’t yet have the awareness to notice.
#IKnewIWasOld when the urge to go exercise was easily overrun by the competing urge to take a nap.
#IKnewIWasOld when at Restaurants
column4: I started ordering appetizers for my main course.

text: #IKnewIWasOld when I could no longer do a full split on a dance floor
column4: but also no longer cared that I couldn’t.

text: #IKnewIWasOld when I started caring more about what is objectively true than about hurting people’s feelings.
#IKnewIWasOld when my family started buying number-candles to represent my age on a Cake rather than single candles themselves.
#IKnewIWasOld the day my growing son was simultaneously bigger than I wanted to lift
column4: and bigger than I was able lift.

text: #IKnewIWasOld when I could swallow a shot of Whisky without wincing.
#IKnewIWasOld when I would walk past a Candy Store and not even notice I was walking past a Candy Store.
#IKnewIWasOld when the threat of being sent to bed early sounded like a reward rather than a punishment.
#IKnewIWasOld when I started liking Blue-Cheese
#IKnewIWasOld when I had no interest in accelerating faster than the guy next to me out of the traffic light that just turned green.
#IKnewIWasOld when on my 60th birthday
column4: I didn’t feel a day over 60.

column4: for air flow.

text: #WhenIWasYourAge: There was hardly any transparent plastic.

column4: we know more than ten-thousand.

text: #WhenIWasYourAge: We actually used a sheet of paper laced with carbon to make a carbon copy — “the cc:" -- of a Letter.

text: #WhenIWasYourAge: Exhaust from City buses billowed at the perfect height for everybody nearby to inhale it.

column4: you had to pause your conversation whenever one flew overhead.

text: #WhenIWasYourAge: No matter what they contained
column4: Bottles were not squeezable.

text: #WhenIWasYourAge: Your home telephone could drop to the floor thousands of times and never break.

column4: which is also where Superman occasionally changed his clothes.

text: #WhenIWasYourAge: On average
column4: the Moon was about 1.5 meters closer to Earth than it is today.

text: #WhenIWasYourAge: Earth's daily rotation was about a half a millisecond faster than today.
#WhenIWasYourAge: Before Xerox copiers
column4: we all got high in elementary school by smelling mimeograph ink.

text: #WhenIWasYourAge: The average Watermelon had a Billion seeds in it.

531651687014883300,Mon Nov 10 03:36:54 +0000 2014,In #Interstellar: You enter a 3-Dimensional portal in space. Yes, you can fall in from any direction. Yes, it’s a Worm Hole.
531651310458638340,Mon Nov 10 03:35:24 +0000 2014,In #Interstellar: You observe great Tidal Waves from great Tidal Forces, of magnitude that orbiting a Black Hole might create
531650380317224960,Mon Nov 10 03:31:42 +0000 2014,In #Interstellar: The producers knew exactly how, why, & when you’d achieve zero-G in space.
531649925629878300,Mon Nov 10 03:29:54 +0000 2014,Relativity. Gravity. Quantum. Electrodynamics. Evolution. Each of these theories is true, whether or not you believe in them.
531649646766981100,Mon Nov 10 03:28:48 +0000 2014,In #Interstellar: Experience Einstein's Curvature of Space as no other feature film has shown.
531649427346186240,Mon Nov 10 03:27:55 +0000 2014,In #Interstellar: Experience Einstein’s Relativity of Time as no other feature film has shown.
531648884288655360,Mon Nov 10 03:25:46 +0000 2014,GPS Satellites are pre-corrected for General Relativity, allowing them to beam us the accurate time for Earth’s surface.
531648725748174850,Mon Nov 10 03:25:08 +0000 2014,GPS satellites, located farther from Earth’s center than we are, keep faster time than do our clocks on Earth’s surface.
531648362324295700,Mon Nov 10 03:23:41 +0000 2014,In #Interstellar: And in the real universe, strong gravitational fields measurably slow passage of time relative to others.
531647559878459400,Mon Nov 10 03:20:30 +0000 2014,In #Interstellar: There’s a robot named KIPP. One of the Executive Producers, a physicist, is named Kip. I’m just saying.
531647147653869600,Mon Nov 10 03:18:52 +0000 2014,In #Interstellar: All leading characters, including McConaughey, Hathaway, Chastain, & Caine play a scientist or engineer.
